org.apache.nutch.plugin

Interface Pluggable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Exchange, HtmlParseFilter, IndexingFilter, IndexWriter, NutchPublisher, Parser, Protocol, ScoringFilter, URLExemptionFilter, URLFilter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScoringFilter, AnchorIndexingFilter, Any23IndexingFilter, Any23ParseFilter, AutomatonURLFilter, BasicIndexingFilter, CCIndexingFilter, CCParseFilter, CloudSearchIndexWriter, CSVIndexWriter, DepthScoringFilter, DomainBlacklistURLFilter, DomainURLFilter, DummyIndexWriter, ElasticIndexWriter, ElasticRestIndexWriter, ExemptionUrlFilter, ExtParser, FastURLFilter, FeedIndexingFilter, FeedParser, File, Ftp, GeoIPIndexingFilter, HeadingsParseFilter, HTMLLanguageParser, HtmlParser, Http, Http, Http, Http, Http, HttpBase, JexlExchange, JexlIndexingFilter, JSParseFilter, KafkaIndexWriter, LanguageIndexingFilter, LinkAnalysisScoringFilter, LinksIndexingFilter, MetadataIndexer, MetaTagsParser, MimeTypeIndexingFilter, MoreIndexingFilter, NaiveBayesParseFilter, NutchPublishers, OkHttp, OPICScoringFilter, OrphanScoringFilter, PrefixURLFilter, RabbitIndexWriter, RabbitMQPublisherImpl, RegexParseFilter, RegexURLFilter, RegexURLFilterBase, RelTagIndexingFilter, RelTagParser, ReplaceIndexer, ScoringFilters, SimilarityScoringFilter, SolrIndexWriter, StaticFieldIndexer, Subcollection, SubcollectionIndexingFilter, SuffixURLFilter, SWFParser, TikaParser, TLDIndexingFilter, TLDScoringFilter, URLMetaIndexingFilter, URLMetaScoringFilter, UrlValidator, ZipParser

    public interface Pluggable
    Defines the capability of a class to be plugged into Nutch. This is a common interface that must be implemented by all Nutch Extension Points.
    Author:
    Jérôme Charron
    See Also:
    About Plugins, plugin package description
